questions.question: What does a steady yellow light mean at an intersection?
options: Speed up to cross the intersection
Prepare to stop, the light is about to turn red
The light is about to turn green
questions.correctAnswer: Prepare to stop, the light is about to turn red
questions.explanation: A steady yellow light is a warning that the light is about to turn red.

questions.question: What does a red octagon-shaped sign mean?
questions.explanation: A red octagon-shaped sign always means stop.

questions.question: Which vehicle must always stop before crossing railroad tracks?
questions.explanation: School buses always have to stop before crossing railroad tracks.

questions.question: When you are entering a roundabout, who has the right of way?
questions.explanation: Vehicles already in the roundabout have the right of way.

questions.question: What is the maximum speed limit on most interstate highways in Alaska?
questions.explanation: The maximum speed limit on most interstate highways in Alaska is 65 mph.

questions.question: Where should you park when your vehicle breaks down on a highway?
options: On the left side of the road
In the middle of the road
On the shoulder of the road
questions.correctAnswer: On the shoulder of the road
questions.explanation: If your vehicle breaks down on a highway, park on the shoulder of the road.

questions.question: What should you do when you are driving in fog?
options: Speed up to get out of the fog quickly
Keep your windows open to hear other vehicles
questions.explanation: When driving in fog, use your low-beam headlights to increase visibility.
